title.en: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai

altTitles.ja: 黒岩メダカに私の可愛いが通じない

altTitles.en: Medaka Kuroiwa is Impervious to My Charms
Kuroiwa Medaka is Proof Against My Cuteness

altTitles.zh: 我的可爱对黑岩目高不管用

altTitles.ru: Куроива Мэдака не понимает моей привлекательности

altTitles.es-la: Mis encantos no funcionan con Kuroiwa Medaka

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
description.fr:
Tu ne le sais pas encore, mais tu m’adores !

Mona plaît à tout le monde, c’est comme ça. Son sourire, son allure, sa personnalité… Tout chez elle attire les gens. Dans son lycée, elle fait tourner toutes les têtes. Sauf celle d’un garçon… Medaka. Fraîchement admis dans son école, celui-ci a complètement chamboulé la vie de cette fille à qui nul ni personne n’est censé résister. C’est bien simple : Medaka refuse de la regarder ou se renfrogne à la moindre de ses tentatives de rapprochement. Devant cette insulte à son charme ravageur, Mona décide de tout mettre en œuvre pour le séduire, quitte à se mettre dans des situations où elle-même ne saura plus quoi ressentir ! La tombeuse VS l’insensible : qui craquera en premier ? 

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!! しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

altTitles.ja: その無能、実は世界最強の魔法使い　〜無能と蔑まれ、貴族家から追い出されたが、ギフト《転生者》が覚醒して前世の能力が蘇った〜

altTitles.en: That Incompetent is Actually the World's Strongest Wizard: He was Scorned as Incompetent and Kicked out of His Aristocratic Family, but His Gift of "Reincarnation" Awakened and Brought Back the Abilities of His Previous Life

description.en:
Alma, the third son of an aristocratic family who could not receive the Gift that should have been given by God, is despised as incompetent from his parents' home and is expelled from the house. However, in reality, Alma was given a special Gift - He regained the abilities of the previous life! With the Gift [Reincarnation], he becomes the strongest wizard in the world! Alma, who devoted all of his first life to the quest for magic, seeks a "happy second life" with the magic of his previous life!
___
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3823gm/)  (JP)
description.ja: この世界の人々は15歳になると、女神様から《ギフト》と呼ばれる様々な能力を与えられる。貴族家の三男・アルマも優秀な《ギフト》を授かることを期待されていたが、なぜか《ギフト》はまったく発現せず、実家から無能と蔑まれ追い出されてしまう…。だが、実はアルマは特別な《ギフト》を授かっていたーー。その能力《転生者》によって前世の記憶と能力を取り戻したアルマは、この世界で最強の魔法使いとなった！一度目の人生の全てを魔法の探究に捧げたアルマが、前世で極めた魔法で”幸せな二度目の人生”へと歩み出す！

Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

description.en:
Aiming for unity of man and hawk! Living with a goshawk "master", hunting and tasting the prey. A four-panel essay on falconry that teaches the traditions of falconry and nature.

Its partner falcon "Donko", his hound Mira and a variety of wild birds! Meet lots of animals!

description.ar:
“لو أصبحت رب الأسرة ، لكان الكثير قد تغير …” مات أخي التوأم بيدي. يتحكم بها بالسحر الأسود ، كلوي ، التي تكرر الذبح غير المرغوب فيه ، ينتهي بها الأمر بقتل شقيقها التوأم بيديها. بدون وقت للحزن ، كان رأس السيف موجهًا إلى قلب كلوي. لقيت كلوي موتًا بائسًا. ولكن عندما فتحت عينيها، عادت إلى الماضي. لن أكرر حياتي الماضية. من أجل حماية الأسرة وشقيقها الحبيب ، قررت أن تصبح رب الأسرة بنفسها ، في شكل أخ توأم. “متوقع. أنتم جعلتموني هكذا.”

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)
description.en:
The Duchy of Francesca rules the northern provinces on behalf of the fallen Imperial family. After the sudden death of the lord of their household, Duke Den, the twins Damian and Chloe become puppets at the hands of their relatives. Controlled by dark magic, Damian becomes the empty-shelled lord of the household while Chloe, who has a natural talent for swordsmanship, becomes an assassin repeatedly committing unwanted murders. Later deemed no longer useful, she falls to dark magic and kills Damian with her hands before meeting her own tragic ending afterward. However, when she opened her eyes once more, she returned to the past. To the past – the day of her beloved father’s, Duke Den’s funeral. From then, Chloe made a decision. A decision to not allow her past life to repeat itself... and to punish her relatives and the vassals who dared turn their backs on her family.

---
“So many things would have been different if you had become the family head…”

*My older twin brother died at my hands.*

Chloe, who was controlled by black magic and forced to murder endlessly against her will, ultimately ends up killing her older twin brother. With barely a moment to mourn, the tip of her sword was immediately pointed at Chloe’s heart. Chloe died a miserable death. But when she opened her eyes again, she realized that she had gone back in time.

*I won’t repeat my past life. In order to protect my family and my beloved older brother, I will personally become the master by becoming my brother.*

“Look forward to it. You are the ones who pushed me to this point.”

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)
description.id:
Duchy of Francesca memerintah provinsi utara atas nama keluarga Kekaisaran yang jatuh. Setelah kematian mendadak tuan rumah tangga mereka, Duke Den, si kembar Damian dan Chloe menjadi boneka di tangan kerabat mereka. Dikendalikan oleh sihir gelap, Damian menjadi penguasa rumah tangga yang bercangkang kosong sementara Chloe, yang memiliki bakat alami dalam ilmu pedang, menjadi seorang pembunuh yang berulang kali melakukan pembunuhan yang tidak diinginkan. Kemudian dianggap tidak lagi berguna, dia jatuh ke sihir hitam dan membunuh Damian dengan tangannya sebelum menemui akhir tragisnya sendiri sesudahnya. Namun, ketika dia membuka matanya sekali lagi, dia kembali ke masa lalu. Ke masa lalu - hari ayah tercintanya, pemakaman Duke Den. Sejak saat itu, Chloe mengambil keputusan. Keputusan untuk tidak membiarkan kehidupan masa lalunya terulang kembali .. dan untuk menghukum kerabatnya dan pengikut yang berani meninggalkan keluarganya.

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)

altTitles.ja: よわよわ先生

description.en: It's the start of a new school year. The new homeroom teacher for Abikura-kun, a second-year high school boy, is Hiyori Hiwamura, who is known as a "Scary Teacher", rumored to curse you if she gets offended! One day after school, Abikura-kun witnessed the other side of "YowaYowa-sensei"... and he is shocked by the gap between reputation and reality!
description.ja: 新学期。2年生に進級した男子高校生・阿比倉くん達のクラス担任になったのは、機嫌を損ねれば呪われると噂の通称『こわこわ先生』こと、鶸村ひより先生だった！ そんな、『こわこわ先生』の裏の一面を、ある日の放課後、目撃してしまった阿比倉くんは……。まさかのギャップに悶絶必至！

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

title.en: Moushin Listener: Yamiochi Haishinsha ni Koishite

altTitles.ja: 妄信リスナー 闇堕ち配信者に恋して

altTitles.en: Credulous Listener: Loving a Streamer Who Has Fallen to the Dark Side
Moushin Listener: Falling in Love with a Dark Streamer

description.en: A friend stabbed a popular streamer to death. University student Asagiri Hina returns to six months ago to save her friend who went crazy and fell in love with the handsome streamer Ravi. However, Ravi was a scumbag who exploited his fans' affection and sold them to the sex industry. To prevent the tragedy from repeating, Hina decides to break her friend's brainwashing. Can she avoid the tragic end!? A story of desires born from the internet society
description.ja: 親友が人気配信者を刺殺した──。大学生の朝霧陽菜は、イケメン配信者ラビにガチ恋して狂ってしまった親友を救うため、半年前に回帰する。ところがラビはファンの愛情を搾取した末に風俗に売り飛ばすようなクズ男だった。悲劇を繰り返さないため、親友の洗脳を解くと決めた陽菜。果たして悲惨な結末を回避できるのか！？ネット社会が生み出した欲望のストーリー【クレジット】原作：西然実音ネーム・背景：もりもとキャラ線画：sno着彩：FELICO STUDIO CO., LTD.制作：Minto Studio

title.en: I Want to Live a Good Life

description.en: The best in the world, excellent martial arts, overflowing money and pleasure----the center of the magical world, Black Astronomy. Kang Hee-ran, the granddaughter of the owner of Heukcheonmun, lives a life that has nothing to lack and nothing to be envied of, but dies at the hands of her stepmother. And for some reason, Heeran reverted to her younger self! In the life that started again, she goes down quietly and kindly with her warm nanny. The first step of revenge begins with making the third Confucius, Kang Lun, the king of the underworld who will soon rule Black Astronomy, into a man of Heiran...!!  I was trying to live...  Heeran's stepmother didn't like the way he looked and started to kill all of Heeran's people.  And Heeran went to the bottom of the Dark Astronomical Gate to the realm of the deep hell for revenge.

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染をえらべない！

altTitles.en: I Can't Choose a Childhood Friend!

altTitles.ja: おさえら

altTitles.pt-br: Eu não consigo escolher uma amiga de infância!

altTitles.vi: Tôi không thể chọn người bạn thơ ấu!

description.en:
I fell in love with my childhood friend, but we ended up separated. Now, after 10 years, I'm finally reunited with her! However, just as I started looking forward to an amazing school life with her, I found out that she was... not alone...?

See also the related [Web Shorts](https://mangadex.org/title/bc53a34e-2771-43f1-b967-9046f4d7b8f1/osananajimi-wo-erabenai) version.
description.ja:
大好きだったけど離れ離れになってしまった幼馴染。
そんな彼女と10年ぶりに再会した！
最高の学校生活が待っているかと思いきや、彼女は“一人じゃなく”て…？
description.vi: Tôi đã yêu người bạn thời thơ ấu của mình, nhưng chúng tôi đã phải xa cách nhau. Giờ đây, sau 10 năm, chúng tôi cuối cùng cũng được tái hợp! Tuy nhiên, ngay khi tôi bắt đầu mong đợi một cuộc sống học đường tuyệt vời, tôi phát hiện ra rằng... cô ấy không chỉ là duy nhất...?!!
description.pt-br: Eu me apaixonei por minha amiga de infância, mas acabamos nos separando. Agora, 10 anos depois, finalmente nos reencontramos! Mas, assim que comecei a me empolgar com minha nova vida escolar com ela, percebi que ela... não era a única...?

title.en: Tensei Shita Ore ga Kawaii Sugirunode, Aisare Kyara wo Mezashite Ganbarimasu

altTitles.ja: 転生した俺が可愛いすぎるので、愛されキャラを目指してがんばります

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensei Shita Ore ga Kawaii Sugirunode, Aisare Kyara wo Mezashite Ganbarimasu

description.en: I was hit by a car while protecting a child, and before I knew it, I had been reincarnated as Yumie Granbell, the daughter of a count in another world. When I looked in the mirror, the reflection staring back at me was an extraordinarily beautiful girl who looked like an angel! Moreover, the Granbell family, into which I was born in this life, is a prestigious magical family with considerable influence. I thought I had hit the jackpot in life, but it turned out that the Granbell family was actually on the verge of collapse… To restore the family, I decided to use my kindness as a weapon!

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

altTitles.ja: アスラの沙汰

description.en: "Only do good deeds."—Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied, he goes on with a smile, firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment. Until one day, an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...
description.pt-br: "Faça apenas boas ações". — Asura segue os ensinamentos de sua falecida mãe e sempre se esforça para fazer o bem. Não importa o quanto seja zoado, continua com um sorriso, acreditando firmemente que os malfeitores receberão uma punição divina. Até que, certo dia, um velho agourento lhe oferece uma chave que pode abrir os Portões do Inferno...

Nhân Vật Phản Diện Đại Sư Huynh, Tất Cả Các Sư Muội Đều Là Yandere

altTitles.uk: Старший брат-наставник - лиходій, а молодші сестри-наставниці ціловито божевільні

description.en:
Lin Xiao became Villain senior Brother of the Qinglan Sect after Reincarnation!

As long as you follow the plot of the original book, and become a Evil villain, you can become a God and ascend to heaven!

Even if he is suffering he had no choice but to tease the fourth junior sister, steal the clothes of the third junior sister, pour some strong medicine into the second junior sister’s water, and conscientiously perform the villain’s duties.
And Finally made it to the day when the male protagonist became a teacher!

Lin Xiao was very excited and prepared to poison the male lead. According to the plot, he will be caught by several junior sisters and thrown by the male lead.

He did not expect......
- - -
Second Junior Sister: My Eldest Senior Brother is still so kind, how can this bit of poison be enough! Look at me!

Third Junior Sister: I'll kill Ye Chen, and kidnap my Senior Brother! He is mine alone!

Fourth Junior Sister: I'll kill everyone... Create a world where there is only my Senior Brother!

Beautiful Master: He's so cute, poisoning behind his back, he really deserves to be called my good disciple.

Lin Xiao: (⊙ˍ⊙) You all should read the script! It's me who should be killed!

A relaxed and joyful anti-routine fairy tale.

title.en: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Savage: Karate Survivor in Another World

altTitles.ja: 野人転生
野人転生: KARATE SURVIVOR IN ANOTHER WORLD

description.en:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
description.ja: 姓名と風貌から、「野人」と呼ばれている野崎人志は、ひょんなことから異世界に転生させられる。
description.es-la: Nozaki Hitoshi, conocido como el "Hombre Salvaje" por su apellido y apariencia, se reencarna accidentalmente en otro mundo.

title.en: I Raised My Younger Sister Beautifully

altTitles.en: I Raised My Little Sis Beautifully

altTitles.th: คราวนี้ฉันจะเลี้ยงน้องเป็นอย่างดี

altTitles.ja: 妹を可愛く育てたら大公 様に溺愛されました

description.en:
When Princess Fleta, who has been mistreated her entire life due to being born with a curse, summons the basilisk and destroys the palace, Princess Cezanne regrets that things could have turned out differently if someone had been by Fleta's side. So when she miraculously finds herself six years back in time, she is determined to take Fleta under her wing and fill her baby sister's life with nothing but joyful light. Will Cezanne be able to dispel the darkness inside Fleta and rewrite the ending?

---
The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. “If there is a next life, then… Can I really be your younger sister?” If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years earlier. If this is the second chance we've been given.
description.ru: Императорская семья рухнула за одну ночь из-за василиска, призванного зверя тьмы, которого призвала проклятая принцесса Флета. «Если есть следующая жизнь, то… Могу ли я действительно быть твоей младшей сестрой?» Если бы я обратился к тебе немного раньше, было бы всё иначе, чем сейчас? Последний раз все об этом пожалели, время чудесным образом вернулось на 6 лет назад. Если это второй шанс, который нам дан...

altTitles.ja: ツインスター・サイクロン・ランナウェイ

description.en:
Six thousand years in the future, humanity has established a civilization in the atmosphere of a gas giant named Fat Beach Ball. There, inhabitants of the resource-starved planet catch Besshu, fish-like creatures that "swim" through the skies. Fishers (exclusively male-female pairs customarily seen as a married couple) use malleable aircraft to bring in their catch.

The story follows Terra Intercontinental Endeavor, a woman looking for a partner, and Diode, a mysterious girl with terrific piloting skills, as they work to establish their same-sex partnership and bring home a successful catch.

Manga adaptation of the cosmic yuri SF novel series written by Ogawa Issui. Ogawa's original "Twinstar Cyclone Runaway" short story was nominated for the Seiun Award in 2020.

altTitles.ja: たあいないのうりょく

description.ja: あなたの超～たあいない～能力は！？相手のお腹を空かせる、ハンコが綺麗に押せる、紙を均等に折れる・・・誰もがちょっと特別な才能「異能」を持つ世界のワーキングコメディ！

altTitles.ja: ババンババンバンバンパイア

description.en: A BL (Bloody Love comedy) set in a long established bathhouse between a skilled vampire and a super pure virgin high school boy.

altTitles.ja: ねずみの初恋

description.en:
Nezumi is a girl who was raised as a hitman by the yakuza and grew up not knowing human love. An ordinary young man, Ao, knows nothing. They fall in love and start to live together, but the evil hand is close at hand... This is a story of first love, so cruel and so sad.

Read the prequel oneshot featuring Messiah-chan's backstory [here](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).
description.fr: Nezumi est une fille qui a été élevée comme tueuse à gages par les yakuzas et qui a grandi sans connaître l'amour humain. Un jeune homme ordinaire, Ao, n'en sait rien. Ils tombent amoureux et commencent à vivre ensemble, mais la main du mal est proche.... C'est l'histoire d'un premier amour, si cruel et si triste.
description.ja: ヤクザに殺し屋として育てられ、人の愛を知らずに育った少女、ねずみ。何も知らない普通の青年、碧(あお)。二人は恋に落ち、共に暮らし始めるが、魔の手はすぐそこまで迫っていた‥‥。
description.pt-br:
Nezumi, uma garota criada como uma assassina pela yakuza, cresceu sem conhecer o amor humano. Ao, um jovem comum, não sabe nada sobre o passado sombrio dela. Mesmo assim, eles se apaixonam e começam a viver juntos, mas o perigo está à espreita... Esta é uma história de um primeiro amor, tão cruel e triste.

Leia o oneshot prequel, que conta a história de origem da Messiah-chan, [aqui](https://mangadex.org/title/a53ff4b3-1514-4b91-9fa0-acd99dd797de/gomennasai-messiah-chan).

altTitles.ja: 遊☆戯☆王 OCG STORIES

description.en: In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.
description.ja: 世界で唯一生存する人間・レイはAIたちと平和に暮らしていた。しかしある日、敵国の攻撃が街を襲う。AIたちを守るため、レイは「閃刀姫」へと覚醒する―…!!
description.pt-br:
No passado distante, a próspera nação de Kama travou uma guerra contra a nação de Spectra, resultando na criação de uma IA que eliminou todos os humanos. Séculos depois, Raye, a última humana sobrevivente, vive entre uma sociedade de andróides nos arredores de Kama. Na noite de seu aniversário de 13 anos, sua vida pacífica é interrompida quando Spectra ataca, destruindo sua casa e forçando seus amigos a irem para a linha de frente. Desesperada para salvar tudo o que ama, Raye invoca o último bastião da humanidade: "Força Celeste", a tecnologia secreta desenvolvida por Kama feita para transformar humanos em armas vivas definitivas.

... Inesperado, certo? Nesta mais nova adaptação de Yu-Gi-Oh, o foco do enredo não está no jogo de cartas, mas sim nas muitas histórias apresentadas nas cartas. O primeiro arco envolve a série Força Celeste, com mais por vir no futuro.

altTitles.zh-hk: 「憑妳也想討伐魔王？」被勇者小隊逐出隊伍，只好在王都自在過活

altTitles.vi: Ngươi Nghĩ Một Kẻ Như Ngươi Có Thể Tiêu Diệt Quỷ Vương?

description.en:
According to the god Origin's prophecy, the girl Flum was chosen to be one of the members of the party that were foretold to defeat the Demon Lord. Everyone already had achievements to their name, as well as the strength to back them up. However, only Flum did not possess any combat prowess, and all of her stats were 0 due to her rare affinity. While being constantly berated, she continued to put great efforts to be useful to the heroes.     

Until one day, she was tricked by one of the party members who said that she “was not necessary anymore” and sold off to a slave trader. Flum was forced to live as a slave, locked away and barely fed. There she encountered a “cursed sword” and realized the true power of her rare affinity, “Reversal.”   The girl, who acquired the power to fight, was indifferent to the Demon Lord and decided to live peacefully as an adventurer alongside a slave girl she met.    

——This is a story of one girl who continued to crawl up from the very bottom in order to regain her peaceful everyday life.

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

description.id:
Aku, si bocchi pendiam, tiba-tiba memiliki sebuah kisah cinta hanya karena satu momen!? Siapa sangka kebahagiaan seperti apa yang tersembunyi di dunia ini...!"
Channel video manga romantis populer di YouTube, "Hometenobasu," kini menjadi sebuah manga!
Berlatar sekolah sebagai panggung utama masa muda, cerita ini menyajikan kisah cinta dramatis seorang bocchi pendiam yang berbalik menjadi sosok populer!

Source YT : @Homenoba

altTitles.ja: 列強戦線

description.en: The year is 2206, and mankind has only 100 years left on planet Earth. The "Nation-Toppling Battle", a war with the survival of each country on the line, begins!!
description.ja: 2206年ーー環境汚染や資源枯渇などにより、人の地球居住可能年数は残り100年と迫っていた。そんな中、人類存続を目的とし、世界人口を減らすため、滅亡させる国を選ぶ戦争『亡国決定戦』の開催が決まる！！ 各国の代表として戦うのは、人ならざる異能を持ち、最強と謳われし少年少女たち。

altTitles.ja: グリーンボックス

description.en: Sena, a high school boy, wakes up in an empty green room. In front of him was a world map and a one-line explanation. "Think of what you want and press the button for the country you want to destroy. You will be released if you win.'' Sena, who is gradually cornered, finally presses the button. Will it be Sena or humanity that will survive in the end?
description.ja: 何もない緑色の部屋で目覚めた男子高校生、瀬名。目の前には世界地図と1行の説明。『欲しい物を思い浮かべながら、滅ぼしたい国のボタンを押せ。当たりなら解放』徐々に追い詰められていく瀬名はついにボタンを押してしまう。果たして最後に生き残るのは瀬名か、人類か。

title.en: Uso Kareshi Demo Ii Kara Tonikaku Shitai Mashiro-chan

altTitles.ja: 嘘彼氏でもいいからとにかくシたいましろちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: Usokareshi Demo Iikara Tonikaku Shitai MASHIRO-chan

altTitles.en: Mashiro-chan Wants to Do It Even If It's with a Fake Boyfriend

description.en:
Mashiro Naomoto wants to have a taste of romance and even get to try lewd things, now that she has become a high school student.

However, she has low self-esteem and as a result of lacking confidence in herself, she began to think that it's probably impossible for her. Right at that moment, to her surprise a handsome male classmate named Oosagi-kun confesses to her. Mashiro starts to suspect that his confession must be some sort of punishment game, but her own desire to do lewd stuff wins over it and as a result, she does the opposite and makes a move on him... it's a case of sexual desire winning over suspicion?!

This is a romcom where a high school girl's libido will run wild!!

(Source: Comic-Meteor)

---

* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomattaaaaan/status/1851462156996551019) (Preview) *Posted with the caption: Doushitemo Sukebe Shitai JK no Manga Kakimashita (どうしてもスケベしたいJKの漫画描きました) "I drew a manga about a high school girl who wants to do perverted stuff no matter what"*
description.ja: 高校生になったのだから恋愛、さらにはＨなことをしてみたい直本ましろ。だが、自己肯定感が低く、自分に自信がないため、どうせ無理だろうなと思っていたところ、なんとクラスメートのイケメン男子・大鷺くんから告白される。絶対に罰ゲームだろうと告白に疑心暗鬼になるましろだったが、Ｈなことをしたいという欲求が勝ったため、逆に大鷺くんに迫るが…性欲は疑惑に勝る!?　性欲強めJKの暴走ラブコメディ!!
description.pt-br:
Mashiro Naomoto quer experimentar o romance e até tentar coisas pervertidas, agora que se tornou uma estudante do ensino médio**.

No entanto, ela tem baixa autoestima e, por falta de confiança em si mesma, começou a pensar que isso provavelmente seria impossível para ela. Nesse momento, para sua surpresa, um colega bonito chamado Oosagi-kun se declara para ela. Mashiro começa a suspeitar que a confissão dele seja algum tipo de jogo de punição, mas seu próprio desejo de fazer coisas pervertidas fala mais alto, e, como resultado, ela toma a iniciativa com ele... seria esse um caso de desejo sexual vencendo a desconfiança?!

Essa é uma comédia romântica onde a libido de uma garota do ensino médio vai correr solta!!

altTitles.en: The Scholar From Joseon Is Here!

description.en:
"I don't think I'm from this time period...!"

On the day of the traditional freshman orientation, where everyone wears scholar robes, Chaewon notices a young male student who was downright fully committed to acting like a scholar of Confucianism era—from his clothing to his manner of speech.

Chaewon ended up receiving help from this peculiar student, yet it wasn't simply him being devoted to the act—he was actually a scholar of Joseon who actually traveled time?! 

Here lies a comedic tale staring the modern university freshman Chaewon, and Hajin, a Confucian scholar from the Joseon dynasty!

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island with Four Beautiful Girls

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！
___
- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

altTitles.ja: 大室家

description.en:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
description.ja: 優秀な長女・撫子、残念な次女・櫻子、優秀な三女・花子からなる大室家３姉妹。自由奔放な櫻子を中心に今日も大室さん家は賑やかです♪

altTitles.ja: 宝石商のメイド

description.en:
The jewelry store Rohstein is an unconventional shop where “a maid sells jewels”.

Off of the main street, the shop is visited by an elderly gentleman, a noble, an actress, a poor student, and all sorts of people who have heard the rumors of it. When they hold the jewels selected by the maid, their own lives also begin to shine.

A tale spun by jewels and people.

With dainty illustrations, a jewel-bestowing short story series.
description.ja:
宝石商「ローシュタイン」は“メイドが宝石を売る”一風変わった品揃えのお店。
大通りから外れたその店には、老紳士、貴族、女優、貧乏学生と噂を聞きつけたさまざまな人が訪れる。
メイドが選んだ宝石を手にしたとき、彼ら自身の人生もまた輝きだす。
宝石と人が紡ぐ物語。
ーー繊細なイラストで贈る珠玉の連作短編。

altTitles.th: ยอดเชฟของโนบุนางะ

altTitles.ja: 信長のシェフ

description.en: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
description.ja: 現代の料理人・ケン。彼が目を覚ますとそこは戦国時代だった。京で評判の料理の噂を聞きつけた信長は、強引にケンを自分の料理人にするが…！？
description.es-la: Ken es un chef de la actualidad. Cuando se despierta, se encuentra en el período de los Estados en Guerra, la era Sengoku. Nobunaga oye un rumor sobre un plato con buena reputación en Kioto, y obliga a Ken a convertirse en su propio chef...
description.pt-br: Ken, um chef da era moderna, encontra-se de volta ao século 16, durante o período Sengoku. Sem qualquer lembrança de quem ele foi um dia ou como chegou ali, ele só pode contar com seu conhecimento e suas habilidades na culinárias. Mas, assim que ele ganha reputação por sua incrível comida, o próprio Oda Nobunaga aparece para demandar seus serviços.

altTitles.ja: チグリジア

description.en: A love triangle where everything is distorted by love.

altTitles.ja: 戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ

description.en:
This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live.

Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...! ?

A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' and fight to save their families!
description.ja:
子どもたちは戦火の中、復讐を誓うー

“戦争×復讐×ケモノ”をテーマにしたドラマティックシュミレーションRPG『戦場のフーガ』の公式コミカライズ作品『戦場のフーガ 鋼鉄のメロディ』！漫画執筆は足立たかふみ氏（代表作：『D・Mファイター焔』や『メタルファイト ベイブレード』など）が担当。

＜あらすじ＞
「イヌヒト」と「ネコヒト」という2種類の種族が暮らす、大小様々な浮島からなる世界――浮遊大陸。
イヌヒトの少年マルトは、辺境にあるプチ・モナ村でヒツウシ飼いをしながら妹のメイと穏やかに暮らしていた。ある日突然、北東の国「ベルマン帝国」から村が襲撃され、一夜にして戦火に焼け落ちる。どうしてこんなことに……混乱するマルトたちにラジオから謎の声が―――！？

戦火に巻き込まれたこどもたちは連れ去られた家族を取り戻すため、謎の巨大戦車『タラニス』に乗り込む！

単行本だけの付録として足立たかふみ氏の設定画やゲームソフト『戦場のフーガ』総監督であり株式会社サイバーコネクトツー代表取締役 松山洋による開発ブログも収録。

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

description.ja: あまり大きな声で好きと言えない“女児向けアニメ”が好きなオタク 瀬尾卓也。ある日、クラスのギャル 天音さんと伊地知さんに絡まれたのだが、何やら天音さんもオタクの匂いが…？
description.vi: Một anh bạn trung bình Otaku thích anime dành cho bé gái, giáp mặt hai nàng Gyaru xinh đẹp nổi tiếng nhất trường. Nhưng không chỉ có thế, một trong hai nữ nhân xinh đẹp ấy có gì đó...hơi otaku thì phải...?
description.es-la: Takuya Seo es un otaku al que le gusta el "anime para chicas" y no puede decir que le guste en voz alta. Un día, se junta con dos chicas de su clase, Amane e Ijichi, pero parece que Amane también es una otaku...
description.pt-br: Takuya Seo é um otaku que gosta de "animes para garotinhas" e não pode dizer isso em voz alta. Um dia, ele conversa com duas gals da sua sala, Amane e Ijichi, mas parece que a Amane também é uma otaku... Uma comédia romântica escolar onde o otaku conhece as gals que ele gosta!

description.es-la: ¡Fuyuki es una hermosa y atractiva gal! ¿Pero hay una parte de ella que solo le muestra a su esposo y mantiene en secreto del resto? Una linda comedia romántica con una esposa que es una gal.
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

title.en: Kaina of the Great Snow Sea

altTitles.ja: 大雪海のカイナ

description.en: A world blanketed in an endless and ever-growing ocean of snow. The people eke out a living, either huddled around the roots of enormous trees dotting the surface, or high in the canopy, which spreads over the planet's atmosphere. A chance meeting between Kaina, a youth from the canopy, and Liliha, a young woman from the surface, sets off a chain of events that will change the fate of the world.
description.ja: 巨木「軌道樹」の上に広がる「天膜」の世界で少年が出会うのは!?

description.en:
Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?

Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer," winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.
description.ru: У Карабоши Харуки нет ничего, что выделяло бы его из толпы, и поэтому он решил стать авантюристом, желая "отличиться". Однажды под его домом на Хоккайдо появилось подземелье. По случайному совпадению, он нашёл так называемую "панель навыков", в которой он может распределять специальные очки для увеличения скорости прокачки. Сможет ли Харуки стать популярным человеком, одержимо посещая своё "домашнее подземелье" каждый день?
description.pt-br:
Karaboshi Haruki não tem presença, tanto quanto pode ser reconhecido, então ele se tornou um aventureiro com apenas o desejo de "se destacar". Um dia, uma masmorra apareceu sob sua casa em Hokkaido. Coincidentemente, ele pegou um "Skill Board" com o qual pode gastar pontos de habilidade para aumentar sua taxa de crescimento. É possível se tornar uma pessoa popular mergulhando obsessivamente na masmorra de sua casa todos os dias?
  
Baseado no popular romance de fantasia Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer", vencedor do 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Heroes' Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for Demons' Daughters
The Demon King's Educator: The Common Teacher Who Has Been Exiled From the Brave Academy Becomes a Private Teacher for the Devil's Daughters

description.en:
Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King’s daughters.
Flay’s new life as an educator, under one roof with five cute but problematic girls with varying personalities, begins!
description.ja: 次代の英雄を育てる学院̶̶通称『勇者学院』。そこで教鞭をとっていたフレイは、同僚に嵌められてクビになってしまう。そんな彼は、謎のメイドから再就職先を斡旋される。その仕事とは、５人の魔王令嬢たちの家庭教師だった！英雄を育てていた教師が、魔王の娘たちを育てていく。

altTitles.ja: キミイロフォーカス
君色写真

description.en: Photography is the art to grasp beauty with the one and only tool, a camera. Oji's dream is to become a photographer that photographs at the front lines of war, to take pictures of historical events taking place in front of his eyes. However, his childhood friend, Sumire, doesn't think that he is capable of becoming one. In his photography club, Oji shows his photos to the group, and his upperclassman, Ran, points out that Sumire is a good target to photograph. Oji manages to get permission to take photos of Sumire, and during his shoot, Sumire notices that Oji is acting differently than before. Later they find out that one of Oji's pictures won an award! Sumire congratulates him, but Oji sees beyond his award. He claims that he learned that he has much more potential than he thinks. Ran, overseeing this, plans to take Oji to the next level so he can capture true beauty through the lens of a camera!
description.ja: 第1巻の内容紹介: 美人部長目当てで写真部に入部した花園大路。いつもは地味め男子な大路だけれど、一度カメラをかまえると女の子をソノ気にさせちゃう不思議な才能に目覚めて!?ときめき★キュン青春PHOTOグラフィティー!!

description.en:
In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

altTitles.ja: りりむキッス

description.en: Saiki Takaya, a guy who is easily misunderstood, one day finds a flask containing the succubus Lilim. She is very attractive but, she also has the tendency to drain the life force out of people. She surprises the life out of him (literally) when she kisses him unconscious. Lilim then flies off for more "food," but returns later, saying that Takaya's life-energy was the "tastiest." From then, Lilim is accepted by Takaya's parents as a live-in girlfriend of sorts, and Takaya's heart seems to start wavering towards this voluptuous devil.
description.es: Saiki Takaya, un tipo al que fácilmente se le malinterpreta, un día encuentra un frasco que contiene a la súcubo Lilim. Ella es muy atractiva, pero también tiene la tendencia a drenar la fuerza vital de las personas. Ella lo sorprende (literalmente) cuando lo besa hasta dejarlo inconsciente. Lilim vuela entonces en busca de más «comida», pero regresa más tarde, diciendo que la energía vital de Takaya era la «más sabrosa». A partir de ese momento, los padres de Takaya aceptan a Lilim como una especie de novia interna, y el corazón de Takaya parece empezar a vacilar hacia esta voluptuosa diablilla.
description.ja: 硬派で通している高校生・斉木貴也が、ある日拾った怪しいペンダント。その中から謎の美少女が出てきて、いきなり貴也にキスを!?　キスをして生気を吸い取る魅惑の悪魔・りりむの封印が今、解けた!!
description.pl: Jeżeli chłopak jest bardzo silny, dobrze się uczy, wygląda zabójczo (one tak twierdzą), ma opryskliwy charakter i nie cierpi dziewczyn, to na pewno życie zaraz sprawi mu wielką niespodziankę. Owa niespodzianka wspaniale całuje … i ma skrzydła!!! Ale za to wspaniale całuje … i wszyscy jego kumple ślinią się na jej widok!!! Ale jak ona całuje … Komedia okultystyczna, czyli praktyczna lekcja wiedzy o demonach na wesoło.
description.es-la: Saiki Takaya, un tipo al que fácilmente se le malinterpreta, un día encuentra un frasco que contiene a la súcubo Lilim. Ella es muy atractiva, pero también tiene la tendencia a drenar la fuerza vital de las personas. Ella lo sorprende (literalmente) cuando lo besa hasta dejarlo inconsciente. Lilim vuela entonces en busca de más «comida», pero regresa más tarde, diciendo que la energía vital de Takaya era la «más sabrosa». A partir de ese momento, los padres de Takaya aceptan a Lilim como una especie de novia interna, y el corazón de Takaya parece empezar a vacilar hacia esta voluptuosa diablilla.

description.en:
For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. 

Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She’s imposing. But she’s also Komi Amane’s girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world. 

The super-popular oneshot has been expanded to a full series here!
description.pt-br:
Pelo que ele pode lembrar, Komi sempre foi mais baixo que seus colegas de classe. Ele sempre se sentiu inferior por causa disso, até que conheceu Obinata – uma garota que é muito mais alta que ele.

Sim, Asumi Obinata é alta. Ela é imponente. Mas ela também é a namorada de Komi Amane. E esses dois são as crianças mais felizes do mundo.

altTitles.en: Packed Up: Police Box Girl Strikes Back

description.en: "I'm quitting!" Kawai, a new female police officer, clutches her letter of resignation, and for some reason, the mega-beautiful Chief Fuji from the Detective Division is assigned to her police box. This is the birth of a duo that brings the men of the Okajima Prefectural Police to despair.
